pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["数据项开发同样有一定复杂度，AntV Infographic 为",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#item","children":"数据项"}],"准备了专用 AI 提示词，便于用大模型快速生成代码。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"development-prompt","children":"开发提示词 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["提示词位于 AntV Infographic ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/infographic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"GitHub 仓库"}],"的中 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/Infographic/blob/main/src/designs/items/prompt.md","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"src/designs/items/prompt.md"}]," 文件中。其中包含以下内容："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"数据项核心概念"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"设计要求（完整性、自适应、数值处理）"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"技术规范（类型定义、可用组件、工具函数）"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"代码模板"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"主题色彩使用"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"渐变定义"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"positionH/V 处理"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"常见问题和最佳实践"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","blockquote",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["使用方法与",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/custom-structure","children":"自定义结构"}],"类似，生成后请在 Dev 环境验证效果。"]}],"
"]}]]}]]

[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["Data item development also has a certain level of complexity. ",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"development-prompt","children":"Development Prompt "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The prompt is located in the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/Infographic/blob/main/src/designs/items/prompt.md","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"src/designs/items/prompt.md"}]," file in the AntV Infographic ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/infographic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"GitHub repository"}],". It contains the following:"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Core concepts of data items"}],"

"]}],"

"]}]]}]]
